const input = $input.first().json;
const body = input.body || input;

const sessionId = body.session_id;
if (!sessionId) throw new Error('session_id is required');

return [{ json: {
  session_id: sessionId,
  idea_id: body.idea_id,
  voice_script_id: body.voice_script_id,
  video_prompt_id: body.video_prompt_id,
  product_image_url: body.product_image_url || '',
  artikul: body.artikul || '',
  show_artikul: body.show_artikul || false,
  heygen_avatar_id: body.heygen_avatar_id || '',
  heygen_voice_id: body.heygen_voice_id || '',
  heygen_background: body.heygen_background || '',
  heygen_ratio: body.heygen_ratio || '9:16',
  subtitle_font: body.subtitle_font || 'Arial',
  subtitle_size: body.subtitle_size || 42,
  subtitle_color: body.subtitle_color || 'white',
  subtitle_outline: body.subtitle_outline || 2,
  watermark_url: body.watermark_url || '',
  watermark_position: body.watermark_position || 'top-right',
  watermark_opacity: body.watermark_opacity || 0.7
}}];

parameters.query:
UPDATE pipeline_sessions SET status = 'processing', current_step = 'loading_data', updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $json.session_id }};

SELECT vs.script_text, vs.timing_marks, vp.prompt_text, vp.scene_descriptions,
       ci.title, ci.concept, ci.visual_description,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'heygen_api_key') AS heygen_api_key,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'heygen_avatar_id') AS default_avatar_id,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'heygen_voice_id') AS default_voice_id
FROM pipeline_sessions ps
LEFT JOIN voice_scripts vs ON vs.id = ps.voice_script_id
LEFT JOIN video_prompts vp ON vp.id = ps.video_prompt_id
LEFT JOIN content_ideas ci ON ci.id = ps.idea_id
WHERE ps.id = {{ $json.session_id }};

UPDATE pipeline_sessions SET
  status = 'ready_for_review',
  current_step = 'review',
  raw_video_url = '{{ $json.raw_video_url.split("'").join("''") }}',
  final_video_url = '{{ $json.raw_video_url.split("'").join("''") }}',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $json.session_id }};

UPDATE pipeline_steps SET status = 'completed', completed_at = NOW()
WHERE session_id = {{ $json.session_id }} AND step_name = 'heygen_video';
